00040 std::string TShapeSizeB3::get_name() const
00041   { return "TShapeSizeB3"; }
00042 
00043 TShapeSizeB3::~TShapeSizeB3() {}
00044 
00045 bool TShapeSizeB3::evaluate( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T, 
00046                                            double& result, 
00047                                            MsqError& err )
00048 {
00049   const double tau = det(T);
00050   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00051     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00052     return false;
00053   }
00054   
00055   result = sqr_Frobenius(T) - 2.0 * std::log(tau) - 2;
00056   return true;
00057 }
00058 
00059 bool TShapeSizeB3::evaluate_with_grad( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T,
00060                                                      double& result,
00061                                                      MsqMatrix<2,2>& deriv_wrt_T,
00062                                                      MsqError& err )
00063 {
00064   const double tau = det(T);
00065   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00066     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00067     return false;
00068   }
00069   
00070   result = sqr_Frobenius(T) - 2.0 * std::log(tau) - 2;
00071   deriv_wrt_T = T;
00072   deriv_wrt_T -= 1/tau * transpose_adj(T);
00073   deriv_wrt_T *= 2;
00074   
00075   return true;
00076 }
00077 
00078 bool TShapeSizeB3::evaluate_with_hess( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& T,
00079                                                      double& result,
00080                                                      MsqMatrix<2,2>& deriv_wrt_T,
00081                                                      MsqMatrix<2,2> second_wrt_T[3],
00082                                                      MsqError& err )
00083 {
00084   const double tau = det(T);
00085   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00086     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00087     return false;
00088   }
00089   
00090   result = sqr_Frobenius(T) - 2.0 * std::log(tau) - 2;
00091 
00092   const MsqMatrix<2,2> adjt = transpose_adj(T);
00093   const double it = 1/tau;
00094   deriv_wrt_T = T;
00095   deriv_wrt_T -= it * adjt;
00096   deriv_wrt_T *= 2;
00097   
00098   set_scaled_outer_product( second_wrt_T, 2*it*it, adjt );
00099   pluseq_scaled_2nd_deriv_of_det( second_wrt_T, -2*it );
00100   pluseq_scaled_I( second_wrt_T, 2.0 );
00101 
00102   return true;
00103 }

00105 
00106 bool TShapeSizeB3::evaluate( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T, 
00107                              double& result, 
00108                              MsqError& err )
00109 {
00110   const double tau = det(T);
00111   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00112     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00113     return false;
00114   }
00115   
00116   double n = Frobenius(T);
00117   result = n*n*n - 3*MSQ_SQRT_THREE*( log(tau) + 1 );
00118   return true;
00119 }
00120 
00121 bool TShapeSizeB3::evaluate_with_grad( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T,
00122                                        double& result,
00123                                        MsqMatrix<3,3>& deriv_wrt_T,
00124                                        MsqError& err )
00125 {
00126   const double tau = det(T);
00127   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00128     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00129     return false;
00130   }
00131   
00132   double n = Frobenius(T);
00133   result = n*n*n - 3*MSQ_SQRT_THREE*( log(tau) + 1 );
00134   
00135   const MsqMatrix<3,3> adjt = transpose_adj(T);
00136   deriv_wrt_T = T;
00137   deriv_wrt_T *= 3*n;
00138   deriv_wrt_T -= 3*MSQ_SQRT_THREE/tau * adjt;
00139   
00140   return true;
00141 }
00142 
00143 bool TShapeSizeB3::evaluate_with_hess( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& T,
00144                                        double& result,
00145                                        MsqMatrix<3,3>& deriv_wrt_T,
00146                                        MsqMatrix<3,3> second_wrt_T[6],
00147                                        MsqError& err )
00148 {
00149   const double tau = det(T);
00150   if (invalid_determinant(tau)) { // barrier
00151     MSQ_SETERR(err)( barrier_violated_msg, MsqError::BARRIER_VIOLATED );
00152     return false;
00153   }
00154   
00155   double n = Frobenius(T);
00156   result = n*n*n - 3*MSQ_SQRT_THREE*( log(tau) + 1 );
00157   
00158   const MsqMatrix<3,3> adjt = transpose_adj(T);
00159   const double it = 1/tau;
00160   deriv_wrt_T = T;
00161   deriv_wrt_T *= 3*n;
00162   deriv_wrt_T -= 3*MSQ_SQRT_THREE*it * adjt;
00163   
00164   set_scaled_outer_product( second_wrt_T, 3/n, T );
00165   pluseq_scaled_I( second_wrt_T, 3*n );
00166   pluseq_scaled_2nd_deriv_of_det( second_wrt_T, -3*MSQ_SQRT_THREE*it, T );
00167   pluseq_scaled_outer_product( second_wrt_T, 3*MSQ_SQRT_THREE*it*it, adjt );
00168   
00169   return true;
00170 }
